name: Hutan Man RTS (Global Game Jam 2019)
description:
A parody of Aqua-Man

but in a forest setting.

This game was developed during the global game jam in a 3 man team.

Game is not fully playable. But the RTS selection and command system is working.

And was featured in one of the other developer's blog post

here:

https://oskadev.blogspot.com/2019/01/global-game-jam-2019-january-25-27-with.htm...

RTS Patrol system and Unit selection movement system is working.

But other RTS mechanics have not been implemented
